mapper.select: SELECT MATRL_SEQ ,MATRL_CD ,MATRL_NM ,MATRL_CTGRY ,(SELECT BASE_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='008' AND B.BASE_CD = A.MATRL_CTGRY) MATRL_CTGRY_NM ,MATRL_GUBUN ,(SELECT BASE_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='005' AND B.BASE_CD = A.MATRL_GUBUN) MATRL_GUBUN_NM ,MATRL_MODEL ,MATRL_THICKNESS ,MATRL_WIDTH ,PRODUCT_UNIT ,(SELECT BASE_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='006' AND B.BASE_CD = A.PRODUCT_UNIT) PRODUCT_UNIT_NM ,TM_UNIT ,(SELECT BASE_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='007' AND B.BASE_CD = A.TM_UNIT) TM_UNIT_NM ,INWHS_CORP_CD ,(SELECT DEAL_CORP_NM FROM TB_DEAL_CORP_ADM B WHERE B.DEAL_CORP_CD = A.INWHS_CORP_CD) INWHS_CORP_NM ,MATRL_GRAVITY ,ETC1 ,ETC2 ,USE_YN ,(SELECT BASE_NM FROM TB_SYSTEM_COMMON_CODE B WHERE B.BASE_GROUP_CD='004' AND B.BASE_CD = A.USE_YN) USE_YN_NM ,MATRL_DESC ,REG_ID ,REG_DATE ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DATE ,INSPECT_ITEM1 ,INSPECT_ITEM1_MODEL ,INSPECT_ITEM1_ALLWNCE_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM3_ALLWNCE_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM4 ,INSPECT_ITEM4_MODEL ,INSPECT_ITEM4_ALLWNCE_THICK_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM4_ALLWNCE_THICK_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM4_ALLWNCE_WIDTH_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_MODEL7 ,INSPECT_ITEM5_MODEL8 ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE1_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE1_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE2_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE2_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE3_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE3_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE4_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE4_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE5_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE5_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM5_ALLWNCE6_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL2 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL3 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL4 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL5 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL6 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_MODEL7 ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE1_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE1_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE2_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE2_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE3_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE3_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE4_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE4_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE5_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE5_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE6_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE6_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE7_PLUS ,INSPECT_ITEM6_ALLWNCE7_MINUS ,INSPECT_ITEM7 SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('0000' + CAST(MAX(MATRL_SEQ)+1 AS NVARCHAR),4), '0001') FROM TB_MATRL_CODE_ADM
